title: T206's For Sale GAI and Loose
author: t206hof

posts.post_title: T206's For Sale GAI and Loose
posts.post_content: I have the following T206's for Sale these are GAI and Loose on the loose ones I will give you my opinion on what they could grade. Scans available on request so you can see for yourself. Thanks. Dennis. Chief Bender (Portrait) GAI 2 Sweet Caporal 150 $72, Eddie Collins GAI 4.5 Piedmont 350 $210. These are all Loose Ritchey Boston Looks like a 2 or 3 C.Caporal 150 $23, Lattimore Toledo Looks like a 2 or 3 Piedmont 350 $19, Cicotte Looks like a 2 it has some pretty heavy creasing Piedmont 150 $40, Mullin Batting Looks like a 2+ S.Caporal 350-460 Overprint $21, Smith Buffalo Cycle 350 Looks like a 2 $50, Schelo Catching Looks like a 2 Piedmont 150 $18, Bergen Brooklyn Batting S.Caporal 150 Looks Like a 5 but has mark on back $ 35, Vic Willis Pitching it will come back a 1 has pretty bad paper  lose on front C.Caporal 150 $27, Three  Finger Brown (Portrait) Sovereign 350 Looks like a 2 $155, Eddie Collins EPDG Looks like a 2 or it is off center on right border but it has enough border where as it will not get a qualifier $130, Mike Donlin Hands on knees Piedmont 150 Looks like a 3+ it has partial name at top to $45, Kiernan SL Piedmont 350 Very Nice Card in my opinion it will grade 5+ $250, H.Camnitz  Hands above head Sovereign 460 Looks like it will grade a 3 $60 (Sold), Larry Doyle throwing S. Caporal 150 Looks like a 3+ Paper loss on back $30, Walter Johnson Portrait Piedmont 150 Looks like a 2 + $480, Jap Barbeau American Beauty 350 Looks like a 2+ $80, Rube Kroh Pitching S.Caporal 350 Looks like a 4+ $40, Nap Rucker Pitching Polar Bear This is a clean card and will grade a 6+ with no stains $120. That's all folks.
Please let me know if you got my e-mail about some raw cards.  Thanks, doug Bacon

Checking to see if you received my request for a scan of a loose card.

Dave
